name: Astral Gun
description: Astral gun is the hyper-competitive 2-4 player party game focused on exciting, intense, and hardcore matches. Create your own play style with 14 unique weapons and thousands of combinations!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: Intel Core i3 M380 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: 2 Players can use the keyboard (use controllers for up to 4 players)

reviews.review_text: PROS:  - Easy to pickup and play - Interesting weapon and ship combos - Cheap while still being able to prove a solid game - Local-coop - Decent amount of maps  CONS: - No custom keybindings - No online multiplayer - Maps are very similar - Lack of bots or training dummies so you can at least do something by yourself.  You pretty much get what you would expect for two dollars, a quick and fun game that obviously didn't have a ton of money put into it but is still a good game. I would like to see it expanded upon, add more maps that differ from the current 'Don't hit the white space.' Online multiplayer would be nice, no matchmaking or anything like that, just the ability to invite your friends. The lack of options and no custom keybindings is basically the only major problem with the game, the key layout isn't good.
